text:
「さっきの尻尾は尻から直接生えているわけじゃないみたいだな」
「そうみたいだ」
均整の取れた背中に指先を触れると、ダンデが小さく身じろいだ。
「キミ、手つきがすごく優しいな。 キミの手持ちたちはいつもこんな気分なのか」
「そう？ 一応最初だし、慎重にな。 気持ち悪い？」
「……いや、そうじゃないんだが……すごく、くすぐったくて」
「ちょ、そういうこと言われるとオレさまも意識しちゃうだろ」
trans:
"The tail earlier does not seem to be directly growing from your backside."
"Looks that way."
When my fingertips touched his well-balanced back, Dande flinched slightly.
"You have such a gentle touch. Is this how your Pokemon always feel when you're handling them?"
"Really? Well, it's my first time, so I am trying to be careful. Does it feel weird?"
"...No, not weird... but it feels incredibly ticklish."
"Hey, don't say things like that, now you are making me self-conscious!"
